title: Mr.Time : Moon Flow
developerAddress: 2F, J Studio, 28, Donggyo-ro 25-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea, 03993
description: *This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps. This watch is called 'Moon Flow'.[Mr.Time Watchface Series]We provide various analog&digital watches with features and sub-dials.More different designs will be updated constantly.Tap: 12h/24h TimeSunrise: 7:00 AMSunset: 6:00 PM
descriptionHTML:
*This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps.

This watch is called 'Moon Flow'.

[Mr.Time Watchface Series]
We provide various analog&digital watches with features and sub-dials.
More different designs will be updated constantly.

Tap: 12h/24h Time
Sunrise: 7:00 AM
Sunset: 6:00 PM
comments: Needs more options: no date, and can't change settings on Moto 360.
